name: estimator
description: Expectation value estimator. A runtime program that estimates the value of an observable for an input quantum circuit. This program is in beta mode and is only available to select accounts.

observable.description: The Hamiltonian to be evaluated. This is a list[tuple[str, float]].

parameters.description: The parameters to be bound. This can be either a list[float] or list[list[float]]].

class_name.description: The name of the evaluator class. Default is PauliExpectationValue.

measurement_error_mitigation.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation. Default is False.

value.description: Estimated expectation value. This is a float.

variance.description: Variance of expectations. This is a float.

confidence_interval.description: The confidence interval. This is a tuple[float, float].
